alert.note: Alert for Central Ventura County Valleys; Lake Casitas; Los Angeles County San Fernando Valley; Ojai Valley; Santa Barbara County Inland Central Coast; Santa Clarita Valley; Santa Ynez Valley; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued December 13 at 3:19AM PST until December 13 at 8:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 32 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Santa Clarita Valley, Santa Barbara County Inland Central Coast, Santa Ynez Valley, Lake Casitas, Ojai Valley, Central Ventura County Valleys, Southeastern Ventura County Valleys and Los Angeles County San Fernando Valley. * WHEN...Until 8 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Frost can damage sensitive plants and harm pets if left unprotected.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Central Ventura County Valleys; Lake Casitas; Los Angeles County San Fernando Valley; Ojai Valley; Santa Barbara County Inland Central Coast; Santa Clarita Valley; Santa Ynez Valley; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys
